title: Implementing .NET Core Logging Levels and Categories

title: What is the difference between .NET Core and .NET Standard Class Library project types?
content:
Question:
In Visual Studio, there are at least 3 different types of class library you can create:
 
Class Library (.NET Framework)
Class Library (.NET Standard)
Class Library (.NET Core)

title: Sending email using Gmail SMTP in asp.net mvc application?
content:
You can use GMAIL SMTP service to send emails using c# .net MVC. You can specify the property constants in a config file for easy alteration.
Create Gmail Class comprises of all needed data type and member function as below.
